hero.title: Your Music Release Laboratory
hero.description: We are a strategic intelligence platform designed to empower creators and record labels with a decisive advantage: data certainty. We fuse the art of music with market analysis, security, and AI to turn each release from a gamble into a strategic investment.
hero.descripcion_m: We are a strategic intelligence platform designed to empower creators and record labels.

steps: Upload your songs, demos, and covers to a secure project.
Send a private link to your test audience (fans, friends, experts).
Analyze audience responses with clear, actionable metrics.
Choose your single, artwork, and marketing strategy powered by data.

about.title: ABOUT.
about.description: In music, intuition is fundamental, but relying on it alone leads to:
bullets: Singles that don’t connect with the expected audience.
Marketing budgets spent on the wrong songs.
Constant fear of your music leaking ahead of time.

perfila.title: PROFILE
perfila.subtitle: Discover Your Fan’s DNA
subtitulos: Choose your next hit with data, not doubt.
Get to know your fan deeply and learn how to win them over.
Share your unreleased music with complete peace of mind.
descripciones: Discover which song has the greatest viral potential by analyzing key metrics like replay rate and drop-off points. Conduct A/B tests to decide between different mixes, artworks, or even TikTok hooks. Our AI engine gives you a predictive "Focufy Score" so you invest your time and money only in ideas with real chances of success.

Through integration with Spotify and SoundCloud, we decode your fan’s DNA: their age, location, and most importantly, which other artists they listen to. Use this intelligence to generate ultra-segmented marketing campaigns and dynamic press kits with a single click. Stop searching for your audience; we bring them to you.

We protect your most valuable asset. Every song you share is marked with an inaudible and unique sonic watermark per listener. In the unlikely event of a leak, our technology allows you to trace the exact source. It’s the ultimate confidentiality guarantee so you can collaborate and receive feedback without risk.
perfila.headerimage: Powerfully Simple: Your Vision, Your Rules, Your Results

planes.title: A Plan for Every Stage of Your Success

list.subtitulo:
Maximize every dollar of your budget.
Invest in what works.
list.descripcion: The essential plan for independent musicians. Validate your songs and discover your audience to ensure your marketing and promotion investment hits the mark.

list.subtitulo: Deliver proven results to your clients and protect their work.
list.descripcion: The perfect tool for professionals. Manage multiple artists, use A/B testing to refine the sound, and deliver data-driven results.

list.subtitulo:
Minimize investment risk.
Manage your entire roster.
list.descripcion: The complete solution for teams. Manage unlimited projects, collaborate with multi-user accounts, and use our predictive AI.

ready.left: Do you have an idea or question?
ready.right: We're in development stage, an independent startup, and we’d love to hear any feedback, suggestions, or business proposals.

footer.subscribe: Yes, subscribe me to your newsletter *

noset: You don’t have any sets created yet.
dropfile: Drag and drop your songs here
questionforall: Use the same questions for all songs
questionval: Select the questions listeners will answer for all songs
imagesforsong: Or an image for each song
intro2: Welcome to Focufy.ai! Your Opinion Shapes the Music.
intro3: Thank you for being here. You are about to participate in an artist’s creative process.
intro3b: Your opinion is not just data
intro3s: it is a key piece that will help shape the final version of these songs. By sharing your impressions, you become an active part of the work
intro4: Before we begin, it is important that you understand and accept the following points:
intro5d1: For this process to work, your sincerity is essential.
intro5d2: Don’t worry, your feedback (votes, reactions, and comments) will be presented to the artist completely anonymously.
intro5d3: We want you to feel completely free to express what you truly think and feel with each song.
intro6t: You Are Listening to Confidential Material
intro6d: The songs you will hear are demos and drafts in progress. They do not represent the final mix, production, or audio quality. You are accessing an intimate stage of the creative process that very few have the privilege to know.
intro7d: An artist’s work is their most valuable asset. To protect it, each audio file on this platform contains a unique inaudible digital watermark (ID) linked exclusively to your listening session.
introlist1: Maintain complete confidentiality of all material (music, art, videos) you see and hear.
introlist2: Do not copy, record, download, distribute, or share this material by any means, physical or digital. Any leak will be directly traceable to its source.
descacept: By clicking the 'Accept and Listen' button, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted all the above points.
introthanks: Thank you very much for your valuable collaboration and for protecting the music!
finish2: Your voice is now part of the creative process.
finish3: Each opinion you shared will directly contribute to shaping the final version of these songs.
finish4: Thank you for your time, your sincerity, and for being part of this unique experience in
finish5: Without people like you, music could not evolve in the same way.
finish6: Very soon you will see the results of what we are building together!
confirmdelquestion: Are you sure you want to delete this question?
confirmdelopt: Are you sure you want to delete this option?
confdelfg: Delete this Focus Group? This action cannot be undone.
nofg: You don't have any focus groups yet.
errordates: Please provide start and end dates
nomusic: You don’t have any shared music at the moment.
repdesc: Choose one of your projects to see the detailed song analysis.
notokensforrep: No projects with tokens found for analysis.
promptgen: You are an experienced music producer. The song '{title}' has a listener retention drop of {drop}% at minute {at}. Suggest 3 specific adjustments (one structural, one instrumental, and one mixing) to solve this issue in a song of {keywords}. Be concise and direct, respond in English.
topdesc: analyzed, these are the 3 with the greatest commercial potential to be your next singles
